effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cowl of the Champion

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks and abilities have a high chance to summon a scarab that retrieves a fortifying chunk of flesh from your target. Scarabs deal 11,764 Physical damage and reduce your damage taken by 50% until 293,996 damage has been prevented.
Use: Send your swarm into a frenzy, summoning 12 scarabs over 3 sec to ravage your foes. The number of scarabs is increased by your Haste. (1 Min Cooldown)

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 10.2 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 923,880 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
